traversables.traversableActionString: You open the door and go through.
traversables.inRoomDescription: You can see a Wooden Door.

traversables.traversableActionString: The handle of the door is ice cold. You pull it open and go through.
traversables.inRoomDescription: You see a Wooden Door leading to a room with a candle.

traversables.traversableActionString: The ladder creaks as you begin to ascend. You pull yourself up and come through a Hatch.
traversables.inRoomDescription: There is an old wooden Ladder that seems to go up forever.

traversables.traversableActionString: You pull the hatch open and jump down.
traversables.inRoomDescription: There is a Hatch on the ground with a wooden Ladder leading down to The Lonely Hideout.
